meanings.definition: Happening in the opposite way to what is expected.
meanings.sent1: The ironic turn of events left everyone surprised.
meanings.sent2: It was ironic that the sun came out during the storm.
meanings.sent3: It was ironic that the cat chased the dog instead of the other way around.
meanings.sent4: The ironic outcome of the game shocked everyone.
meanings.sent5: The ironic change in weather caught everyone off guard.

meanings.definition: Coincidental or unexpected in a way that is amusing or strange.
meanings.sent1: It was ironic that they both wore the same outfit to the party.
meanings.sent2: The ironic timing of the phone call made her laugh.
meanings.sent3: It was ironic that the rain stopped right when they finished singing.
